line.kanji: 絶体絶命!Summer Night
line.english: I'm desperete! Summer Night

line.kanji: 完徹決定!All Night
line.english: Gotta pull an all nighter! All Night

line.kanji: ヤバイ! ヤバイ! まぢでヤバイ!(やばい!)
line.english: this is bad! bad! This is seriously bad (it's bad!)

line.kanji: La La La La…..
line.english: La La La La…..

line.kanji: What a Night!
line.english: What a Night!

line.romaji: shakunetsu taiyou no shita de kongari komugi iro
line.kanji: 灼熱|太陽|の|下|で|こんがり|小麦|色
line.english: Getting burnt to a crisp under the scorching hot sun

line.romaji: raibu bikini kimodameshi saikkou no natsuyasumi!
line.kanji: ライブ ビキニ きもだめし さいっこうの夏休み!
line.english: Live shows, bikinis, dares, it's the greatest summer holiday

line.romaji: futo kidzukeba sanjuuichinichi massao nasubi iro
line.kanji: ふと気付けば31日 真っ青ナスビ色
line.english: Before I knew it the 31st had arrived and I was as pale as an eggplant

line.romaji: zutto kaban nemutteta tetsukazu yamadzumi purinto
line.kanji: ずっとカバン眠ってた 手付かず山積みプリント
line.english: sleeping away in my bag was a huge pile of worksheets

line.kanji: クエスチョン!
line.english: Question!

line.kanji: x＋y=?”CIA!”
line.english: x＋y=?”CIA!”

line.kanji: オーストラリアの首都は? “ありません!”
line.english: What's the capital city of Australia? "There isn't one!"

line.romaji: houryuuji wo tateta no wa? “himiko sama!”
line.kanji: 法隆寺を建てたのは? “卑弥呼様!”
line.english: Who built the houryuuji shrine? “Lady Himiko!”

line.kanji: 意味不明!
line.english: It doesn't make sense

line.romaji: Where do you live now? “Yes, I do!”
line.hiragana: Where do you live now? “Yes, I do!”
line.kanji: Where do you live now? “Yes, I do!”
line.english: Where do you live now? “Yes, I do!”

line.romaji: sanso wo tsukuru ni wa? “wanito shanpuu!”
line.kanji: 酸素を作るには? “ワニとシャンプー!”
line.english: What's oxygen made of? "Alligators and shampoo!"

line.kanji: やばい! ヤバイ! yabai! ゃヴぁぃ! YABAI!
line.english: This is bad! Bad! Bad! Bad! Bad!

line.kanji: まぢヤバすぎる!
line.english: It's seriously bad!

line.kanji: 終わらない 終わらない
line.english: It never ends, never ends

line.kanji: ぜーんぜん ぜんぜん 終わらない
line.english: it really really never ends

line.kanji: 8月最終日の宿題!
line.english: The homework at the end of August

line.romaji: tekito ni yatte mo shou ga nai demo
line.kanji: てきとにやってもしょうがない でも
line.english: Gotta do it half-heartedly, though

line.romaji: tekito ni yaru shika shou ga nai
line.kanji: てきとにやるしかしょうがない
line.english: half-heartedly is the only way I can do it

line.kanji: とりあえずひたすらかきまくれー!!
line.english: For now I just have to write!!

line.kanji: わからない わからない
line.english: I don't get it, don't understand

line.kanji: ぜーんぜん ぜんぜん わからない
line.english: I really really don't understand

line.romaji: mou sukoshi tekagen shite yo shukudai
line.kanji: もう少し手加減してよ 宿題!
line.english: Please go a little easier on me, homework!

line.romaji: dareka no sei ni wa shitakunai demo
line.kanji: 誰かのせいにはしたくないでも
line.english: I don't want it to be anyones fault but

line.romaji: jibun no sei ni wa shitakunai
line.kanji: 自分のせいにはしたくない
line.english: I don't want it to be my fault either

line.kanji: 残り80枚!
line.english: 80 sheets left to go!

line.kanji: 終わらない宿題
line.english: The homework never ends

line.kanji: 絶体絶命!Summer Night
line.english: I'm desperate! Summer Night

line.kanji: 完徹決定!All Night
line.english: Gotta pull an all nighter! All Night

line.kanji: ヤバイ! ヤバイ! まぢでヤバイ!(やばい!)
line.english: this is bad! bad! This is seriously bad (it's bad!)

line.kanji: La La La La…..
line.english: La La La La…..

line.kanji: What a Night!
line.english: What a Night!

line.romaji: shuugyoushiki kara kyou ga kuru made mainichi kakenuketa
line.kanji: 終業式から 今日が来るまで 毎日かけぬけた
line.english: the days since school finished till now have gone by so quickly

line.romaji: kyanpu ibento suika wari taisetsu na omoide
line.kanji: キャンプ イベント スイカ割り 大切な思い出
line.english: Camping, events, splitting watermelons, they're all precious memories

line.romaji: wasureteta wake janai kedo ooki na wasuremono
line.kanji: 忘れてたわけじゃないけど 大きな忘れ物
line.english: It's not that I forgot it, but there was something big I forgot

line.romaji: kitto nantoka naru desho? sha-pen nigitte taiketsu!!
line.kanji: きっと なんとかなるでしょ? シャーペン握って 対決!!
line.english: surely it'll work out in the end? I grasp my pencil, Showdown!!

line.kanji: かかれー!
line.english: Begin!

line.kanji: 読書感想文”使いまわし!”
line.english: Review a book "Reuse a review"!

line.kanji: お天気 “毎日 くもり!”
line.english: The weather "Everyday is cloudy"!

line.kanji: やばい! ヤバイ! yabai! ゃヴぁぃ! YABAI!
line.english: This is bad! Bad! Bad! Bad! Bad!

line.kanji: まぢヤバすぎる!
line.english: It's super bad!

line.kanji: 終わらない 終わらない
line.english: It never ends, never ends

line.kanji: ぜーんぜん ぜんぜん 終わらない
line.english: It really really never ends

line.kanji: 8月最終日の宿題!
line.english: The homework at the end of August

line.romaji: koukai shitatte shou ga nai demo
line.kanji: こうかいしたってしょうがない でも
line.english: I can't help but regret it

line.romaji: koukai suru shika shou ga nai
line.kanji: こうかいするしか しょうがない
line.english: There's no choice but to regret it

line.kanji: 神様一学期戻してよっっっっ!!
line.english: God. please send be back to first semester!!

line.kanji: わからない わからない
line.english: I don't get it, don't understand

line.kanji: ぜーんぜん ぜんぜん わからない
line.english: I really, really don't understand

line.romaji: mou sukoshi tekagen shite yo shukudai!
line.kanji: もう少し手加減してよ 宿題!
line.english: Please go a little easier on me, homework!

line.kanji: 言い訳なんかは したくない
line.english: I don't want to make any excuses

line.romaji: demo iiwake suru shika shikata nai
line.kanji: でも言い訳するしか しかたない
line.english: but I can't do anything but make excuses

line.kanji: 残り70枚!
line.english: 70 sheets left to do!

line.kanji: 終わらない宿題
line.english: The homework never ends

line.romaji: jikan dake ga sugite yuku kedo
line.kanji: 時間だけが 過ぎてゆくけど
line.english: Time keeps on going by but

line.romaji: jikan dake ga sugite yuku kedo
line.kanji: 出口は まだまだ 先の先
line.english: There's still no end in sight

line.kanji: SOS メール出しても
line.english: I sent an SOS mail out

line.kanji: 返信 ゼロ件・・・・
line.english: but there were no replies

line.kanji: 自業自得 因果応報
line.english: You reap what you sow, devine retribution

line.kanji: 四面楚歌
line.english: Surrounded by the enemy

line.kanji: 二学期なんか来なくてもいい
line.english: If only second semester would wait

line.kanji: はぁ・・・・終わんない
line.english: ahh... it never ends

line.kanji: 終わらない 終わらない
line.english: It never ends, never ends

line.kanji: ぜーんぜん ぜんぜん 終わらない
line.english: It really, really never ends
